title: Arvind Kejriwal announces alliance with Kerala's Twenty20 Party; promises free power if elected to power - Times Now
content: Arvind Kejriwal announces alliance with Kerala's Twenty20 Party; promises free power if elected to power  Times NowView Full coverage on Google News
description: Arvind Kejriwal said now, there will be four political alliances in Kerala - LDF, UDF, NDA "and the name of our alliance will be People's Welfare Alliance". In the last assembly elections held in 2021, the Left-led alliance returned to power for the second consecutive terms under Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan. The Left got 45 per cent votes, while the Congress secured 39 and the BJP 12 per cent.
